patched_yaml:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      name: hello-pod
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: hello-container
        image: aswroma3/hello:2021-kube
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      name: hello-pod
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: hello-container
        image: aswroma3/hello:2021-kube
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello
  template:
    metadata:
      name: hello-pod
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: hello-container
        image: aswroma3/hello:2021-kube
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
spec:
  replicas: 2

    metadata:
      name: hello-pod
      labels:
        app: hello
    spec:
      containers:

        image: aswroma3/hello:2021-kube
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW

            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: opentsdb-read
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: opentsdb-read
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: opentsdb-read
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: opentsdb-read
        image: gcr.io/cloud-solutions-images/opentsdb-bigtable:v2.1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4242
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - name: opentsdb-config
          mountPath: /opt/opentsdb
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: opentsdb-config
        configMap:
          name: opentsdb-config
          items:
          - key: opentsdb.conf
            path: opentsdb.conf

apiVersion: apps/v1

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: machine-controller-manager
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      role: machine-controller-manager
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        role: machine-controller-manager
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: machine-controller-manager
        image: eu.gcr.io/gardener-project/gardener/machine-controller-manager:v0.39.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        command:
        - ./machine-controller-manager
        - --target-kubeconfig=/var/lib/machine-controller-manager/kubeconfig
        - --control-kubeconfig=inClusterConfig
        - --safety-up=2
        - --safety-down=1
        - --machine-safety-overshooting-period=1m
        - --v=3
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10258
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/machine-controller-manager
          name: machine-controller-manager
          readOnly: true
        resources: {}
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      - command:
        - ./machine-controller
        - --control-kubeconfig=inClusterConfig
        - --target-kubeconfig=/var/lib/machine-controller-manager/kubeconfig
        - --machine-creation-timeout=20m
        - --machine-drain-timeout=5m
        - --machine-health-timeout=10m
        - --machine-safety-orphan-vms-period=30m
        - --node-conditions=ReadonlyFilesystem,KernelDeadlock,DiskPressure
        - --v=3
        image: eu.gcr.io/gardener-project/gardener/machine-controller-manager-provider-gcp:v0.7.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10259
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: machine-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10259
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 350m
            memory: 3000Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/machine-controller-manager
          name: machine-controller-manager
          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      securityContext: {}
      volumes:
      - name: machine-controller-manager
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: machine-controller-manager

          readOnly: true
        securityContext:
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      securityContext: {}
      volumes:
      - name: machine-controller-manager
        secret:
          defaultMode: 420
          secretName: machine-controller-manager

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sloth
  namespace: default
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: sloth-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app: sloth
    app.kubernetes.io/name: sloth
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: sloth
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: sloth
      app.kubernetes.io/name: sloth
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: sloth
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        helm.sh/chart: sloth-0.1.0
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app: sloth
        app.kubernetes.io/name: sloth
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: sloth
      annotations:
        kubectl.kubernetes.io/default-container: sloth
    spec:
      serviceAccountName: sloth
      containers:
      - name: sloth
        image: slok/sloth:v0.6.0
        args:
        - kubernetes-controller
        - --resync-interval=3m
        - --sli-plugins-path=/plugins
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - name: sloth-common-sli-plugins
          mountPath: /plugins/sloth-common-sli-plugins
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 150Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 75Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      - name: git-sync-plugins
        image: k8s.gcr.io/git-sync/git-sync:v3.3.4
        args:
        - --repo=https://github.com/slok/sloth-common-sli-plugins
        - --branch=main
        - --wait=30
        - --webhook-url=http://localhost:8082/-/reload
        volumeMounts:
        - name: sloth-common-sli-plugins
          mountPath: /tmp/git
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: sloth-common-sli-plugins
        emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sloth
  namespace: default
  labels:
    helm.sh/chart: sloth-0.1.0
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app: sloth
    app.kubernetes.io/name: sloth
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: sloth
spec:

  template:

        securityContext:

          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:

      - name: git-sync-plugins

        - --branch=main
        - --wait=30
        - --webhook-url=http://localhost:8082/-/reload
        volumeMounts:
        - name: sloth-common-sli-plugins
          mountPath: /tmp/git
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 5m
            memory: 50Mi
        securityContext:
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: sloth-common-sli-plugins
        emptyDir: {}

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:

  labels:

    app.kubernetes.io/instance: sloth

        - --branch=main
        - --wait=30
        - --webhook-url=http://localhost:8082/-/reload

          privileged: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
            - NET_ADMIN
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - SYS_MODULE
            - SYS_PTRACE
            - SYS_CHROOT
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      volumes:
      - name: sloth-common-sli-plugins
        emptyDir: {}
